thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent in every way
thread.title_full: Excellent in every way - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Karen0075
title: Excellent in every way
text: I had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Monge for five nights during my recent trip to Paris. Immediately upon arrival I was made to feel very welcomed, which continued throughout my stay. The staff are very helpful for restaurant suggestions, but also the mundane - but very important - transportation options throughout the city. The room was very nice, clean and comfortable. I enjoyed the breakfast as well and felt it was high quality. The location is within walking distance of many sites and very close to two metro stops. I will definitely stay at Hotel Monge again if I find myself back in Paris (which I hope I do).
